name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-bot-attachments-dotnet
title: Bot Attachments
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates how to send and receive file attachments in Microsoft Teams using a bot built with the Teams SDK.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates file attachment handling in Microsoft Teams using a bot built with the Teams SDK. When a user sends a file, the bot downloads it, stores it in memory, and sends a File Consent Card requesting permission to upload to OneDrive. Upon acceptance, the bot uploads the file and sends a File Info Card with a direct link. Declined requests are handled gracefully with a notification message.
